Edges-Fighter -- Male Human Heroic Fighter
Attributes (12 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d8 Strength: d12 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes: Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Skills (22 Points):
Academics: (sma) d6 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Athletics: (agi) d8 Notice: (sma) d6 Taunt: (sma) d4
Battle: (sma) d6 Occult: (sma) d4 Thievery: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Performance: (spi) d8
Fighting: (agi) d8 Persuasion: (spi) d4
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Aquan; Common
Skill Notes: Danger Sense: +2 Notice (surprise)/May attempt Notice-2 in circumstances not normally subject to Notice
Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral Deity: Lamashtu (Evil)
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 12; Edge: 6; Skill: 10
Features
Edges (5 points): Danger Sense; Deadly Blow; Fighter; Martial Flexibility (Improved); Martial Prowess Hindrances: Shamed+; Slow; Suspicious Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Fighter: Has Martial Flexibility feature
Deadly Blow: +1 combat damage
Shamed+: Past event causes social antagonism
Suspicious: Trusts no one
Combat
Parry: 7 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 10 (2) Pace/Run: 5/+d4
Armor: Leather Jacket Shield: Light Shield Weapons: Dagger (d12+d4 R3"); Light Repeating Crossbow (2d6 R10" AP 2); Short Sword (d12+d6); Unarmed (d12+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +4 Parry
Martial Flexibility (Improved): Increased Martial Flexibility effects
Slow: -1 Pace/-1 Run Step
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Martial Flexibility: May gain the benefits of a combat edge for 5 rd 2/encounter
Martial Prowess: May reroll failed combat attacks
